item.title: Bread
item.description:
Whole grain - DK

Day 1 (soaking)

  • 225 g cracked ray grains
  • 225 g seeds
  • 300 g warm water
  • 75 g acidic sourdough 

Leave soaking covered for 6 h or over night

Day 2

  • 300 g whole grain rye flour
  • 300 g warm water
  • 180 g acidic sour dough 
  • 15 g salt
  • Optional malt/brown sirup (~30g)

Add everything together with the soaked seeds and add more rye flower/water until the consistency of minced meat is reached.

item.title: Deserts
item.description:
Milchreis (rice Porridge)

  • 200 g short grain rice
  • 200 ml water
  • 500 ml milk
  • vanilla sugar to taste
  • cinnamon to taste

After washing the rice, add water and bring to a boil. Then lower to medium heat and add the milk and let simmer for 30 min or until the rice is tender. Add seasoning to taste.

Coconut variant

  • 200 g rice
  • 300 ml water

Cook the rice, while preparing the sauce

item.title: Main courses
item.description:
Pizza and Pasta

Penne Arrabiata

  • 300 g penne
  • 500 ml sieved tomato’s
  • 4 cloves of garlic
  • 4-5 tbsp olive oil
  • 1 tsp chili flakes
  • 2 tsp salt
  • opt fresh Basil
  • opt 2 tbsp tomato purée

While cooking the penne in salted water finely chop/crush the garlic and fry together with the chili flakes under medium heat until the garlic just starts to turn brown. To the garlic add ca. 50 ml of penne water and 500 ml of sieved tomatoes. Combine sieved pasta with sauce. Optionally add fresh Basil
